advancement.travel: Advance timeline after full-day travel or major downtime blocks.
advancement.triggered_events: Some events fire when linked clocks tick or rumors are resolved.
advancement.logging: Record each advancement with [timeline:advance] and cite event ids in changelog entries.

integration.faction_clocks: Tie event readiness to faction clock fill levels.
integration.rumors: Validate or debunk rumors by revealing events; adjust rumor truth accordingly.
integration.snapshots: Create snapshots whenever time jumps by more than one event.
